Why Are Cats Cute? Cats have a unique kind of cuteness.They show affection through their large green eyes, they depict playfulness by chasing laser lights and toy spiders,and they become a part of your home (read: furniture) by lying on their backs with their legs perched up in the air. Below are 10 reasons why cats make for the cutest pets.
1.They are independent and spiritually detached. 2.They love their siestas. 3.They express their displeasure gracefully. 4.They can easily be kept busy for hours. 5.They use different tones of meows to manipulate you. 6.They love being carried like a human baby. 7.Cats own you and not vice versa. 8.They think they're cleaner than you. 9.They are extremely curious. 10.They have a cute yet difficult personality.
